text: Simon Schenk (16 May 1946 – 1 May 2020) was a Swiss politician. ==Biography== Schenk served as a member of the National Council from 1994 to 2001, representing the Canton of Bern. He was also the coach of the Switzerland men's national ice hockey team. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from the canton of Bern Category:Swiss People's Party politicians Category:Members of the National Council (Switzerland)
title: Simon Schenk
